title: Vayne Build and Itemization
body:
Let's talk {{champion:67}} .

I'm not the best {{champion:67}} out there, but I reckon with practice i could become good. 
eventually :(
I've been watching s5 matches and streams from Gosu, ImaQTpie, and past matches from Imp and Uzi etc.
I see them take a liking to a q max rather than a w max. Or as {{item:3087}} or {{item:3142}}   over {{item:3153}}.
I look at Imp's runes and he runs 9 Flat AD marks, 3 Flat AS Quints. 9 flat armour seals, 4 Flat AS glyphs, 2 Mana regen glyphs and 3 flat MR glyphs.

I don't run these, or build like them, usually I aim for:
{{item:3153}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3139}} {{item:3072}} {{item:3031}} 
 But have opted out {{item:3031}} for a {{item:3142}}. I start QWE, then proceed w max.
I run 9 flat AD marks, 6-ish FLat AS glyphs, 3-ish FLat MR glyphs, 9 AS quints and 9 armour seals.

So what are your thoughts on my build?
What do you guys suggest?
